contacts.name: Guinaifen
contacts.signature: Not causing trouble, not fearing trouble, and no crazy challenges

122020000.text:
Here's something you might like:
#RoamingPhantoms A young maiden accidentally entered an abandoned garden and found herself assailed by roaming ghosts in a den of peril!
#ThrillsAndChills #BoneChilling With ghosts hidden all over the abandoned garden, there is enough on-site danger to make someone choke!
Livestreaming NOW: Live broadcast of paranormal activities! Two girls accidentally entered the garden and fell prey to vile ghosts! One turns as pale as a waxen moon, the other falls to shock and is still in a coma! Viewing not advised for anyone below two hundred years of age!
A Triple-A Experience: Supernatural occurrences keep happening. An uninhabited garden conceals a mind-blowing secret!

122020002.text: For more deets about ghosts on the Xianzhou, please like and follow Little Gui for more awesome content

122020003.text: Yes yes yes! So pray tell where can I see it?

122020004.text: Why are there more people promoting strange advertisements in my messages?

122020005.text: It's definitely another hocus-pocus stream that ends up with magnetic distortions or some magic trick being the reason behind shenanigans

122020007.text: Ha! It sounds like you're interested, fam.

122020008.text: I haven't edited the stream recording yet, so I won't send the link

122020009.text: How about this? If you're really interested, then come find me!

122020010.text: I'm very interested. Don't go anywhere, I'm coming to find you.

122020011.text: Alright, hurry it up. I'm in dire need of someone like you who's burning with curiosity!

122020014.text: Reach deep inside and give your honest answer to me~ After all, you're the only one who replied to my mass message...

122020015.text: How about this? I can show you the raw footage of my ghost live stream fresh from the oven!

122020017.text: Fool someone into heading over, then get them to pay or do chores because they're there already.

122020018.text: Agh, fine, how about this. I can show you the raw footage of my ghost live stream fresh from the oven!

122020019.text: I'm here at Aurum Alley. If you see a red-haired traveler, that's me!
